children.description: Overrides default loader with given content
children.description_zh: 使用给定内容覆盖默认加载器

color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, default value is theme.primaryColor
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的 Key 或任何有效的 CSS 颜色，默认值为 theme.primaryColor

loaders.description: Object of loaders components, can be customized via default props or inline. Default value contains bars, oval and dots
loaders.description_zh: Object of loaders 组件，可以通过默认 props 或内联进行自定义。默认值包含条形、椭圆和点

size.description: Controls width and height of the loader. Loader has predefined xs-xl values. Numbers are converted to rem. Default value is 'md'
size.description_zh: 控制加载器的宽度和高度。Loader 具有预定义的 xs-xl 值。数字转换为 rem。默认值为 'md'

type.description: Loader type, key of loaders prop, default value is 'oval'
type.description_zh: Loader 类型，loaders 属性的 key，默认值为 'oval'
